cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.current_location: about 785 mi ESE of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the North/South Carolina coastline
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Cape Fear–Wilmington, North Carolina coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC and north of Duck NC to the NC/VA border
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from South Santee River SC to Duck NC, including Albemarle and Pamlico Sounds
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Coasts of South Carolina, North Carolina and portions of the Mid-Atlantic
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤5%) of brief tropical-storm-force gusts in outer rain bands late Thursday–Friday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor water rise and surf; surge expected to stay below 1 ft
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents and high surf along NE Florida beaches
